preface.title: About This Guide
preface.para:
&sles4sapreg; is the reference platform for the software development of &sap;. It is optimized for &sap; applications.
This document provides detailed information about installing and customizing &sles4sap;.
This document guides you through the installation of &sles4sap;.

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: The &sles4sap; Guide is divided into the following chapters:

listitem.para: Information on hardware requirements, the installation workflow, partitioning, and other installation planning aspects.
Installing the &sls; operating system that forms the basis of &sles4sap;.
Installing &sap; applications on &sles4sap;, either directly after the installation of the operating system or in a running system.
Setting up a server for all &instmedia; used within your organization.

sect1.title: Additional Documentation and Resources
sect1.para: Chapters in this manual contain links to additional documentation resources that are either available on the system or on the Internet.
